name: 倪達仁
objective:
讓修習者能夠認識與運用策略所需的知識背景、分析工具與技巧，並能在實務中加以應用。學習者首先將學會「策略分析工具」的運用，包括策略的定義與基本的策略管理程序，以及競爭優勢(competitive　advantage)的內涵。其次，則將學習如何分析外部環境；然後，引介應用「VRIO」架構評估內部環境。此外，學習者也將在本課程中學會成本領導和差異化等兩大類的事業層級策略型態，並進一步探討各種公司策略的機制與運作。

Strategic Management
The main purpose of this course is to lead the students to successfully identify and use the tools, skills and competencies for making and implementing strategy. For this purpose, the logical relations, the systematically inquiry, the connection between theory and practice will be stressed. the contents will be divide three parts, one is focused on the analytical tools, basic definitions such as competitive　advantage and the  scope of a strategy, including the VRIO framework as our core tool.  Then the study will focus on two types of strategies: cost leadership and differentiation. Finally, the inquiry will include several types of cooperate strategies such as vertical integration. Nonetheless, the organizational and implementing issues will be discussed at all chapters.
